metadata.title: Asset Metadata
metadata.name: Atari Limited Edition 2020
metadata.description: The Atari Limited Edition 2020 token is the first non-fungible voucher Atari launched, only 60 were minted. They released it on May 26th 2020 to celebrate their partnership with the blockchain developer platform Arkane Network. Collectors in possession of such a voucher are allowed to redeem it for $25 worth in Atari tokens. For more info: https://t.me/AtariTokenOfficial
